needs.NeedsEnergyModal.FeedingSummary.translation: Cozmo needs to be fed to stay energized and upbeat.

needs.NeedsEnergyModal.Instruction1.translation: Grab any Cube that is pulsing blue.

needs.NeedsEnergyModal.Instruction2.translation: Shake that Cube until all lights glow brightly.

needs.NeedsEnergyModal.Instruction3.translation: Place the Cube where Cozmo can see it, so he can feed himself.

needs.NeedsRepairModal.RepairSummary.translation: Cozmo needs to be tuned up to stay optimized and on-the-move.

needs.NeedsRepairModal.RepairButtonsInst.translation: Tap the parts to be tuned up.

needs.NeedsRepairModal.TuneUpInstruction.translation: Use the buttons on the right to recreate the arrow pattern. Then tap SEND.
